  • Constructor Details

    • Enemy

      public Enemy(double size, PositionComponent position, DrawingComponent drawingComponent, MovementComponent movementComponent, AIControllerComponent aiControllerComponent, WeaponComponent weaponComponent, HitboxComponent hitbox)
      Constructs a new Entity instance with the specified position and drawing components.
      Parameters:
      size -
      position - The PositionComponent that defines the position and rotation of the entity.
      drawingComponent - The DrawingComponent responsible for rendering the entity.
      movementComponent - The MovementComponent that can move the entity.
      aiControllerComponent - The AIControllerComponent which can calculate the entity's next movement.'
      weaponComponent - TheWeaponComponent which allows the entity to attack.
      hitbox - The HitboxComponent used for collision detection.
